participant_1.background:
My weekends are for relaxing and spending time with my family.
I have been to Japan, and I found the culture to be very different from my own
I'm struggling with my parents' distance, but I'm doing well in school.
my mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

participant_2.background:
I love spending time with my alpacas.
i love christmas.
I've had my cards read a couple of times.
I take my dog for a walk after I wake up.
I'd like to be able to weld things.

content.text: What are you up to this weekend?
I am going to visit my parents in the country. I love spending time with them.
That sounds nice. I like to spend time with my family too. My mom is a music teacher at the elementary school.
That's cool! My parents run an alpaca farm. I love hanging out with the animals.
I've never been to an alpaca farm before. I'd love to see them sometime.
They are really cute and friendly. I'm sure you would like them.
I'm sure I would. What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks with my dog. I also like to read and watch movies.
I like to go for walks too. I'm not really a big reader or movie watcher, but I do enjoy going to concerts.
I love concerts! I'm going to see a band I love next weekend.
That sounds fun! I hope you have a good time.
What do you do for a living?
I work as a welder. I really like it.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to weld.
It's not too hard to learn. You should give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun
